title: The gay men's guide to safer sex (E)
creator_credit: Terrence Higgins Trust, Basilisk Productions, James MacKay and David Lewis
brief_description: A documentary produced by gay men for gay men offering information on HIV and AIDS and exploring the boundaries and possibilities of safe consensual sex. Using a straightforward presentation sexual information is offered in an unintimidating manner. Includes information on using condoms effectively, how to have safe oral sex and how to avoid transmission of blood and semen in S/M sex play. WARNING: CONTAINS EXPLICIT SEXUAL MATERIAL.
